Add the contents of the Mortar to the Cauldron
Lower the Cauldron
Put x1 Charcoal into the Mortar and Grind it
Put the contents of the Mortar into the Dish
Add x1 Dandelion to the Cauldron
While the animation is playing, repeatedly press the turn Hourglass button
Just before the Hourglass runs out, Raise the Cauldron
Add the contents of the Dish to the Cauldron
Pour the contents of the Cauldron into a Phial

steps: Add Oil to the Cauldron
Put x2 Thistle into the Mortar and Grind it
Add the contents of the Mortar to the Cauldron
Lower the Cauldron
Put x1 Charcoal into the Mortar and Grind it
Put the contents of the Mortar into the Dish
Add x1 Dandelion to the Cauldron
Add the contents of the Dish to the Cauldron
While the animation is playing, Raise the Cauldron
Pour the contents of the Cauldron into a Phial

effects.description: You can't wash your own clothes without soap.
